long_description: There's nothing like a refreshing shower after a weekend of roughing it. Use the freestanding Nemo Helio(TM) Pressure shower to clean up as soon as you get back to the car. Helio has a 2.9 gal. (11 liter) capacity to provide 5 - 7 min. of steady water pressure. Use the foot pump to regulate the water pressure. Includes a 7 ft. hose with spray nozzle. Packs down to 5.5 x 8.5 in. in a ventilated, zippered carrying case; weighs only 1 lb. 9 oz. The Nemo Helio(TM) Pressure shower can also be used to wash dishes, spray mud off your mountain bike or give the dog a bath.
short_description: There's nothing like a refreshing shower after a weekend of roughing it. Use the freestanding Nemo Helio(TM) Pressure shower to clean up as soon as you get back to the car.
